special_text:
[+0]: Proliferate, then you may cast a spell with mana value equal to or less than this planeswalker’s loyalty without paying its mana cost.
[-2]: Create a 4/4 blue Elemental Bird creature token with flying.
[-X]: Return X nonland permanents to their owners’ hands. If you return four or more nontoken permanents you control this way, you may put a permanent card from your hand onto the battlefield.
